author: Scott Miller
title: Promise of Opening Day and a Fresh Sports Calendar Offers Hope for Better Days
description: What we desperately need right now is a national game of catch. Each of us, across the land, six feet or more from the next person, of course (60 feet, six inches away would be perfect)...
content:
Jonathan Daniel/Getty Images
What we desperately need right now is a national game of catch. Each of us, across the land, six feet or more from the next person, of course (60 feet, six inches away would be perfect).
Opening Day, or what was supposed to have… [+9274 chars]
